desc: Crazy Carnivores BBQ Supply is a small, family-run business located in Ayr, Ontario that specializes in premium BBQ cookwoods, sauces & rubs, supplies & accessories. Our products are hand-selected by a guy that is crazy about BBQ. We sell the best products at the best prices, delivered to your door.

layout.text: Our products are hand-selected by a guy who is crazy about BBQ
